guide.introduction: I don't pretend to be an electrician so I won't tell anyone to mess with 120 volt power. This is simply a reference to the wires involved. The most important thing to remember is.. where does the power start ? If you know that, you can follow simple problem solving techniques using a voltmeter. Power from Switch to Switch to Light. Power fro Light to Switch to Switch.Power from Switch to Light to Switch.

guide.summary: Most people come into contact with these switches. They're in most homes with hallways and staircases. When they stop working, they are a mystery. These drawings are a roadmap to the power applications found in most installations.
